title: Why did I get suspended?
body: I get suspended for what? Oh I know because my in-game name is Draven Toxic. Unban it please.

replies.body: You were punished after manual review. After briefly checking your chat logs, I can tell you it has nothing to do with your name. You will need to write into player support regarding your case.

If you were punished by the Instant Feedback System you would receive a reform card in your client, and should receive an email either way. If you didn't get enough information from that, submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Don't worry you'll be permabanned soon enough.
(This is a RANKED game)
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2243698972/1?tab=builds&participant=7

(this is all chat only, * replaced by / to avoid bolding the text)
[8:38] Draven Toxic: report bard gg
[8:48] Draven Toxic: //// this support
[8:55] Draven Toxic: this //// won't help but won't gtfo my lane
[8:57] Draven Toxic: //// died twice
[9:14] Draven Toxic: enjoy loss team
[9:19] Draven Toxic: thank your //// support
[9:23] Draven Toxic: gg
[9:28] Draven Toxic: refuses to leave
[10:02] _Draven Toxic has quit_
[13:00] _Draven Toxic reconnected_
[13:08] Draven Toxic: still hasn't left bot lane
[13:29] Draven Toxic: bard telling me to stfu
[13:32] Draven Toxic: when i tell him to roam
[13:36] Draven Toxic: because he got me killed twice
[13:40] Draven Toxic: it's over
[13:41] Draven Toxic: gg
[13:50] Draven Toxic: deserve loss ////
[15:06] Draven Toxic: report bard
[15:10] Draven Toxic: cause and effect
[15:12] Draven Toxic: get trolled
[15:15] Draven Toxic: team gets trolled
[15:18] Draven Toxic: same ////
[15:21] Draven Toxic: not my fault
[15:24] Draven Toxic: bard //// triggered me
[15:25] Draven Toxic: like ////
[17:19] Draven Toxic: mouse break
[17:20] Draven Toxic: lag
[21:25] Draven Toxic: i

How did you get this?!

Its hella funny though!
Wait seriously, how did you get this...?

> Unban it please.

Nah, take your permaban along with your stack of {{champion:119}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} , just like your rank game :)

I LOVE ME SOME CHAT LOGS. 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Feel free to post your chat logs.
